title: Building a Responsive Website from Scratch
description: Learn how to create a fully responsive website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Perfect for beginners looking to get started with web development.

title: JavaScript ES6+ Features You Should Know
description: Explore the most important ES6+ features that every JavaScript developer should master. Includes arrow functions, destructuring, modules, and more.

title: CSS Grid vs Flexbox: When to Use Which?
description: A comprehensive comparison between CSS Grid and Flexbox. Learn when to use each layout method with practical examples and real-world scenarios.

title: Building a Task Manager App with Vanilla JavaScript
description: Create a fully functional task management application using only vanilla JavaScript. Learn about DOM manipulation, local storage, and event handling.

title: Web Performance Optimization Tips
description: Learn essential techniques to make your websites faster and more efficient. Covers image optimization, code splitting, caching strategies, and more.

title: Getting Started with GitHub Pages
description: Learn how to deploy your websites for free using GitHub Pages. Perfect for hosting portfolios, documentation, and static websites.
